entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending after midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 50 km/h except 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
